steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8v8md","text":"To purify FUNDC1-GST, fuse the cytosol-exposed domain of FUNDC1 (1-50aa) to a C-terminal GST-tag through cloning into a pET-DUET1 vector (available on Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6c0aa","text":"Introduce the point mutants by in vitro mutagenesis to generate FUNDC1 Y18A/L21A (ΔLIR)(available on Addgene). After the transformation of the pET-DUET1 vector encoding FUNDC1-GST wild-type or mutants in E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells (Novagen Cat# 70956-4), grow the cells in 2x Tryptone Yeast extract (TY) medium at   until an OD600  of 0.4 and then continue at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":328,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":315,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":361,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}
